Primitive.name: initial_balances
Primitive.description: the initial balance of each node in the graph (should have size m)

Primitive.name: arc_capacities
Primitive.description: the maximal capacity (>=0) of each arc in the graph (should have size m x m) keeping the graph sparse enhances the presentation

Primitive.name: arc_costs
Primitive.description: the cost factor (>=0) of each arc in the graph (should have size m x m)

Primitive.name: number_nodes
Primitive.description: in the following m. for display reasons, this number needs to be between 5 and 7
